content: Most notably, however, may be that above and beyond the program's third-party revenue and profit stream, our cardholder base of nearly 400,000 currently drives about 15% of our total air and air ancillary revenue and the level of spend by this group on air and air ancillary has grown by more than 350% since 2019. Your line is now open. Your line is now open. Your line is now open. Your line is now open. And then in terms of -- just as we're thinking about next year, I think in face of a recession, to get to your point, 1, we focus on leisure customers, which generally it's a stickier we've got historically -- been a stickier kind of customer base. Your line is now open.
